a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of countries with key economic and social rights for women,
Equal right to start a business
Data source: World Bank - Women, Business and the Law (2024)
Note: "Pay equity" refers to "work of equal value”, meaning not just the same job, but also different jobs that are similar in skills,
